nodes.text: The Star Wars Saga is a 1983 Del Rey boxed set collecting the three Star Wars original trilogy film novelizations, now considered part of Star Wars Legends. The collected stories include Star Wars by Alan Dean Foster, The Empire Strikes Back by Donald F. Glut, and Return of the Jedi by James Kahn.
The boxed set's cover artwork featuring Darth Vader was later adapted for Del Rey's 1987 The Star Wars Trilogy compilation.
